string-array.name: db_rating_reason
string-array.item: No one can out pizza the hut!!
There bread sticks better than pizza hut and the sauce that comes with it are great too.
when using dark mode it can help reduce eye strain when you have to complete a last minute programming project. Also it just looks better.
Everything is just to white, but at least it can help you focus on the code that you are write.
There is more freedom to do things than compared to apples IOS.
They box you in and limit you, but its a good looking box to be in.
